timeline.bodyText: This feels a bit awkward: can we normalize the return value beforehand so that we don't have to "guess" where the HTML array lives?
timeline.author: kevinushey

replies.bodyText: Academy requested the callback function return a list in the original specs so I'm following up with them to see if it can return a string since that would make things simple.
replies.author: melissa-barca

replies.bodyText: The callback function returns a list with 'html' in it now in case we want to add other variables in the future. I moved all the management of that object to the back end code.
